title: Land Near Matara New Town Labeema
details:
District – Matara
Village - Sulthanagoda

1.5km from New Matara District Hospital and proposed Matara New Town Labeema.
5 minutes to Godagama expressway Interchange.
Land Extent 21.4 perch in Sulthanagoda, Matara.
Valuable big 06 Jack trees are available (Timber value more than 06 lakhs)
Electricity, telephone, water Board water supply available.
Price 4 Million SLR

Contact : D.M.S. Dissanayake 0713470706
